biotools.summary: Bioactive Conformational Ensemble (BCE) is a platform designed to efficiently generate bioactive conformers and speed up the drug discovery process. Bioactive Conformational Ensemble Server and Database. A Public Framework to Speed Up In Silico Drug Discovery.
